column8:
John Walker The New Zealander and Mile and 2000m World Record Holder notably said it is not the will to win that is most important in athletics and racing generally, it is the will to prepare.


If you watch the attached video can there be any doubt Bradley Wiggins and his Sky team mates are not prepared for Bradley to win this years Tour de France, Mark Cavendish to win the Green Sprinter's Jersey and Team Sky to secure the team honours? 


We are putting our money where our mouth is.  All our TdF shirts this year predict Bradley Wiggins for the GC and Mark Cavendish for the Green Jersey.  In the unlikely event we are wrong we will correct your shirt.  Just send it back after the race and and we will make the appropriate changes.


Admire Bradley Wiggins, Mark Cavendish, Team Sky and all the team coaches and assistants, wear our Bradley Wiggins wins the Tour de France t shirt.
